infotext:
Si tu aimes cette extension
vote & rapporte bogues
Merci
empty clipboard: Il n'y a rien dans le presse-papier
empty trash: Il n'y a rien dans la poubelle
empty custom: Pas de textes personnalisés. Ajoutes-les aux préférences de l'extension
Adjust the look: Personnalises l'apparence du Smart Clipboard comme tu l'aimes
Choose key combination: Choisis une combination pour ouvrir le menu de Smart Clipboard
key may differ:
the key shown may differ from what you pressed depending on the keyboard layout you're using.
Nevertheless it got saved properly
close menu by: Tu peux fermer le menu par appuyer sur Esc
keep exceeds in trash: keep entries which exceed the maximum number in trash
clear history when closed: clear clipboard history when Opera is closed
clear trash when closed: clear trash when Opera is closed
custom texts: You can add frequently used texts in here to make them easily accessible for insertion via the "Custom Texts" tab in the clipboard menu
Title: Title
slim mode description:
If you're using keyboard commands for pasting, you will find this very useful:
if you press Ctrl (Cmd ⌘ on a Mac) and hit V, it'll work just like it used to be, but if you keep Ctrl pressed and hit V multiple times, the Smart Clipboard menu will pop up and toggle through your history. When you reached the entry you need to paste, hit C (still holding Ctrl/Cmd ⌘) and you will see this entry moving to the top. It is now active again and you can insert it wherever you need it
full mode description: You can access it by pressing Ctrl/Cmd ⌘+Alt+A (as you have probably seen you can adjust this key combination at the top). The menu will then stay open until you hit Esc or click the "X" in the upper right corner of the Smart Clipboard menu. In this mode you can select the entries (history, trash as well as custom text snippets you saved here in the options) you want with the mouse. Then press Ctrl/Cmd ⌘+C to make the chosen entry active.
note rightclick copy: Note: if you're using Opera 12.10 or newer you can also rightclick and choose "copy"
footer: Merci d'avoir installé cette extension. Pour des commentaires et des questions, n'hésite pas à me contacter
